title: Where's Your Hair?
description: Hairless animals are everywhere! These curious creatures can be wild animals or cute and cuddly pets. Where's Your Hair? introduces students to fascinating hairless animals of all kinds. Vibrant photographs showcase these strange-looking creatures while text features expand upon how many of these hairless animals came to be. Students will gain practice in asking and answering questions as well as in identifying the author's purpose.
meta: adapted, breeds, bred, genes, mammals, mutation
